archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.7.5e: e) offers specialised services before, during and after a security incident (e.g. awareness training, vulnerability management, forensic investigations, legal assistance, or public relations support)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
